title: Consider a decision afresh
applicationTitle: Apply to have a decision considered afresh
content: Use this form to have a judgment or order made by a legal officer considered afresh by an Employment Judge.
Considered afresh means that if you disagree with a judgment or order made by a legal officer in your case, you can ask an Employment Judge to look at that decision again.
The judge will take the decision afresh on the basis of the same information as was before the legal officer, unless either side chooses to supply additional information.
Details to include in your application:
• the date the tribunal issued the decision
• why you want the decision considered afresh
